column4: dammit. it just crashed. the whole thing. can't get anything to move but the mouse. gonna hard reboot.
is it best to test this in firefox or chromium? and youtube or some other site?
go to the software centre and see if there are any other flash viewers installed.
can you view the html5 videos on youtube?
delete both and do a re-installation.
it doesn't matter what you use. they all use apt in the background.
uninstall flash player and try a alternative like gnash.
down side is you can't view any other page except youtube.
you got the wrong package. you should have got mozilla-plugin-gnash.
